theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cytokine-Mediated Vascular Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on chronic low-grade inflammation via pro- and anti-inflammatory cytokines driving vascular aging and dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immunometabolic Regulation and Macrophage Polarization Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes macrophage polarization shifts, immunometabolism, autophagy, and interferon signaling in inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Cytokine-Driven Inflammaging as Fundamental Aging Driver Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging as chronic systemic cytokine elevation causally linked to multiple age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immunity and Auto[innate]immunity-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on innate immune system activation and auto[innate] immunity as drivers of inflammaging and frailty.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Cytokine-Driven Inflammaging as Fundamental Aging Driver Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on chronic low-grade systemic inflammation with cytokine imbalance and gender differences in inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immunity and Auto[innate]immunity-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights innate immune dysfunction, immunosenescence, and inflammation as drivers of neurological aging diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Cytokine-Driven Inflammaging as Fundamental Aging Driver Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes chronic systemic inflammation with gender differences affecting infection susceptibility and inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and ROS-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on mitochondrial mutations, ROS, mtDNA release triggering inflammation and immunosenescence in inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immunity and Auto[innate]immunity-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes innate immunity, macrophage activity, and genetic control of pro-inflammatory phenotype in neuroinflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Stem Cell Niche Cytokine Network Breakdown Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging as cytokine network breakdown in stem cell niches with DNA damage and macrophage amplification.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Cytokine-Driven Inflammaging as Fundamental Aging Driver Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on chronic low-grade inflammation as a driver of aging influenced by environment and immunobiography.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immunity and Auto[innate]immunity-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights innate immune system lifelong activation, genetic influences, and evolutionary trade-offs in inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Mitochondrial Dysfunction and ROS-Induced Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links inflammaging to mitochondrial dysfunction, oxidative stress, and autophagic impairment driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Monocyte-Driven Intestinal Barrier Dysfunction Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes inflammaging driven by monocyte remodeling causes intestinal barrier dysfunction, with sex-specific effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Cytokine-Driven Inflammaging as Fundamental Aging Driver Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging as chronic systemic inflammation linked to immunosenescence, senescence, and multiple diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immunity and Auto[innate]immunity-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on TLR signaling, innate immune cell activation, and senescence-associated secretory phenotype in inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immunity and Auto[innate]immunity-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes dysregulated innate and adaptive immunity, neuroinflammation, and immune dysfunction in inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Aging and Cancer Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links chronic inflammation to aging and cancer development, highlighting genetic selection and longevity balance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Cytokine-Driven Inflammaging as Fundamental Aging Driver Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging as systemic inflammation from multiple tissues, involving senescence, DNA damage, and ROS.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Microglial Senescence and Glymphatic Clearance Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on brain waste clearance failure, microglial senescence, SASP, and propagation of inflammaging in CNS.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Inflammation-Driven Aging and Cancer Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes systemic and local inflammaging driving cancer via NF-κB, ROS, SASP, and DNA damage pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Gut Microbiota Dysbiosis and DNA Repair Decline Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links gut microbiota changes to systemic inflammation that impairs DNA damage repair, driving inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Cytokine-Driven Inflammaging as Fundamental Aging Driver Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on chronic inflammation causing tissue damage, linked with senescence and oxidative stress in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Systemic Cytokine-Driven Inflammaging as Fundamental Aging Driver Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes inflammaging as multifactorial systemic inflammation involving senescence, mitochondrial dysfunction, and microbiota.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immunity and Auto[innate]immunity-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Frames inflammaging as adaptive immune response involving macrophages, immunobiography, and network homeostasis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Innate Immunity and Auto[innate]immunity-Driven Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes immune remodeling, innate and adaptive immunity, antigenic load, and genetic/environmental factors in inflammaging.
